name: Unnamed 2d top down mech game
description:
Hello !

In this game you control a mech on a planet invaded by alien bugs. You need to crowd control the bugs, complete objectives, and level up to gain power and customize your mech.

It's a very early stage prototype with just the basic ideas layed out. Please feel free to tell me what you think in the comments, any feedback is appreciated and really helpful.

How to play 

Get to your objective and stay on them until completed, then proceed to the next.

The yellow arrow points to your current objective, the blue arrow points to nearby gear or ammo. 

Your primary weapon shoots automatically at the closest target.

Secondary weapon is activated manually.

Enemies are infinite so don't try to kill everything. Just survive and complete your objectives.

Controls

On mobile, virtual stick to move, and swipe up or tap the button to fire your secondary weapon.

On desktop, use your keyboard arrows and space to fire your secondary weapon.

(This help can also be shown in-game.)
